sourcing.instructions: - Erbium can be sourced from specialized rare earth metal suppliers or online marketplaces.
steps: - Erbium can be sourced from specialized rare earth metal suppliers or online marketplaces.
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Place the ceramic crucible in a high-temperature furnace.
heating.raw_text: 1. Place the ceramic crucible in a high-temperature furnace.

steps: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 25°C).
cooling.raw_text: 1. After heating, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature (approximately 25°C).

steps: 1. Use a diamond grinding wheel to shape the material to the desired dimensions (3"x2"x7").
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a diamond grinding wheel to shape the material to the desired dimensions (3"x2"x7").
